response.original_title: Darla's Book Club: A Tale of Two Cities
response.overview: Darla's Book Club is for everyone and anyone ready to discuss books, books and more books! Sometimes the stories around how books are created are even more fascinating than the fictional tales themselves! And sometimes we’re curious to learn about a book, whether we’ve read it or not. In this documentary, join Darla as she discusses the novel A Tale Of Two Cities. Join the club with Darla's Book Club: A Tale Of Two Cities!
response.title: Darla's Book Club: A Tale of Two Cities
